title: Those Who Have Wings - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Martial Arts   Romance
author: Yumeneko   夢猫
description:
The mercenary guild, The Dipterous Sword. 

A world-renowned Guild and its unique members deal with the numerous requests and problems that unexpectedly come in one after another. Their daily lives and their pasts intersect.

This is a story about the members of The Dipterous Sword guild from the novel, “The Magnificent Battle Records of a Former Noble Lady”.

‘Those Who Have Wings’ can be read as a stand-alone, but there may be some events that relate to the contents of the previous novel.
>
